text: Héctor Lastra (Buenos Aires, Argentina, 1943 – July 16, 2006) was a writer from Argentina. ==Works== *Cuentos de mármol y hollín (short stories, 1965) *De tierra y escapularios (short stories, 1969) *La boca de la ballena (novel, 1973) *Fredi (novel, 1996) ==References== * * ==External links== Category:Argentine male novelists Category:Argentine male short story writers Category:Writers from Buenos Aires Category:1943 births Category:2006 deaths
title: Héctor Lastra
